The problem is that the Turing webpage prominently documents the AdvancedHMC `sample` call and its arguments, so IMO the actual issue is that there is no clear separation between Turing docs and the docs of all the dependencies such as AdvancedHMC, EllipticalSliceSampling, AbstractMCMC etc.

text:
> Is this because AdvancedHMC doesn't use the AbstractMCMC interface yet?
Partly. But Turing does more than just calling the `sample` /inference methods of the algorithms in external packages, and hence it is likely that the supported options and possibly also arguments are always a bit different if you use the external packages directly.
